definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
global warming (Taiwan and Hong Kong usage)/written 全球變暖|全球变暖 in PRC

sentences.english: I didn't see one global warming placard in Parliament Square the other day.
sentences.chinese: 前幾天，我並沒有在議會廣場看到全球暖化的標語。

sentences.english: The result is a feedback loop that accelerates local warming.
sentences.chinese: 其結果是一個惡性循環，加速局地的暖化。

sentences.english: What many people do not know, however, is that the production of meat also significantly increases global warming.
sentences.chinese: 然而，很多人不知道，肉類生產也大大加重全球暖化。

sentences.english: The Impact of Global Warming and Population Changes on Global Agriculture;
sentences.chinese: 多種因素將會增加大全球暖化對農業和林業的影響。

sentences.english: Global warming is melting the Arctic ice-cap.
sentences.chinese: 北極圈冰層因著全球暖化正在融化中。

sentences.english: Global warming refers to the increasing average temperature of the Earth’s air and water.
sentences.chinese: 全球暖化指的是地球大氣和水體平均溫度的上升。

sentences.english: Multiple factors will amplify the effects of global warming on agriculture and forestry.
sentences.chinese: 多種因素將會增加大全球暖化對農業和林業的影響。

definition: Nuannuan district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan
to melt/to thaw/to dissolve/to blend into/to combine/to fuse
a man who is family-oriented, considerate and protective
reserved/aloof/(geography) (of a location) elevated and cold
